name: cc10x
description: Reality-based development system with skills-first architecture: ONE master orchestrator skill + 11 sub-agents + 18 domain skills. /review (5-star with working AI agents), 4 systematic workflows via master orchestrator. Real 65-79% token savings via progressive skill loading. Integrates 'What Could Go Wrong?' 7-dimension risk analysis, Complexity Assessment, File Manifests, Rollback/Deployment strategies. Honest: 3-20x MORE tokens than manual (structure has cost), use for complexity 4-5 only. Follows official Anthropic patterns.
